active_skill.name: Sweet and Juicy
active_skill.description:
Shoots juice bullets at the character currently on the battlefield. If the bullet misses, the juice will remain on the ground for a while. Characters coming into contact with the juice will recover HP. The recovery effect can only trigger up to 15 times per combat.

HP Recovery: 15%
Cooldown 20s

additional_ability.name: Replenishing Sugar Levels
additional_ability.description:
When there is at least 1 Support character in your squad:
Active Skill recovers 40% more HP.
Active Skill has 3 more charges.
